title: Bug 45145: Second window comes to front when using first
OB: When switching from another application to an Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the second window comes to the front, obscuring other application windows.
EB: Expect the focused Eclipse window to remain in the front after clicking on a docked view or perspective, without bringing the other Eclipse window to the front and obscuring other application windows.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open Eclipse and have multiple windows open.
2. Switch to another application.
3. Switch back to Eclipse.
4. Click on a docked view or change perspective.
5. Observe if the second Eclipse window comes to the front, obscuring other application windows.
